<!-- T端bingen-Tabu Game Project Instructions -->

## Project Overview

This is an Astro-based TypeScript web application that recreates the classic Tabu game with T端bingen-specific terms and references.

## Development Progress

- [x] Project setup and structure created
- [x] Install dependencies and configure Astro
- [x] Create game components and layout
- [x] Implement game logic and timer
- [x] Add T端bingen-specific terms database
- [x] Style with modern responsive design
- [x] Configure GitHub Pages deployment

## Tech Stack

- **Framework**: Astro with TypeScript
- **Styling**: CSS with modern features
- **Deployment**: GitHub Pages
- **Game Features**: Timer, scoring, responsive design

## Key Features

- T端bingen-specific terms (WHO, Boris Palmer, Platanenallee, etc.)
- Timer functionality for game rounds
- Team scoring system
- Responsive modern design
- Static site optimized for GitHub Pages
